parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle of the bend in radians

parameters.name: BUseDefaultRadius
parameters.description: True to use the default radius, false to use the value specified in radius

parameters.name: Radius
parameters.description: Value for the radius of the bend if bUseDefaultRadius is false

parameters.name: FlipDir
parameters.description: True to flip the bend direction, false to not

parameters.name: BendPos
parameters.description: Bend position: 0 = bend centerline 1 = material inside 2 = material outside 3 = bend outside

parameters.name: PCBA
parameters.description: If... Then... non-NULL Pointer to ICustomBendAllowance object for which required values have been set NULL Parent bend's bend allowance is used
